definition: philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: It's not all mystical New Age spiritualism, or even overt religiosity .
sentences.chinese: 這不全然是新時代的神祕唯心論或甚至宗教狂熱。
唯心論和唯物論是對立的。

sentences.english: Your idealism MADE you believe in the existence of supernatural beings.
sentences.chinese: 你的唯心論使你相信超自然生命的存在。

sentences.english: Spiritualism, then, suitably stands opposed to materialism.
sentences.chinese: 唯心論，那麼，適當地站在反對唯物論。
